A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I sat in the theatre with my stomach in knots as I witnessed my fears come to pass:  Star Wars (like Trek\, my other sic-fi love) had been hijacked by the divisive\, identity-politics agenda. 
 
Why is this social lecturing so heavy-handed and ubiquitous now?
Are we not allowed politics-free entertainment anymore? 
Are we turning into Orwell's 1984?

I left the theatre with tears in my eyes - bitter tears of grief - as I thought about how this film mocked what had so inspired me as a child. I thought about Luke's journey in the originals -from idealistic youth to mature Jedi Knight - and then the petulant coward he was in this\, and those tears of grief became tears of rage!
